title: Dropping out: broken dreams
brief_description: This program teaches that education means options through the personal experiences of six adolescent students who have dropped out of school, experienced the realities of job hunting and decided for themselves that they need an education. This video is suitable for career studies and personal development and is relevant to the Australian situation.
